snippet: The Los Angeles Lakers acquired point guard Ramon Sessions from Cleveland on Thursday in a four-player trade sending Luke Walton and Jason Kapono to the Cavaliers.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers acquire point guard Ramon Sessions from Cleveland Cavaliers in four-player trade; Sessions replaces Derek Fisher, who was sent to Houston Rockets, along with a 2012 first-round draft pick.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers acquired point guard Ramon Sessions from Cleveland on Thursday in a four-player trade sending Luke Walton and Jason Kapono to the Cavaliers.

headline.print_headline: Lakers Trade For Sessions; Fisher Exits
headline.seo: Lakers Acquire Sessions and Trade Fisher to Rockets
headline.main: Lakers Trade for Sessions; Fisher Exits
